articles.title: Wreckage of China Eastern plane found over 10km away - The Star Online
articles.description: TENG COUNTY, Guangxi (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Rescue workers have expanded their search area where a China Eastern plane crashed on Monday (March 21) in Teng County in southern Guangxi, and found aircraft parts more than 10km away.

articles.title: 25-year-old Thai star of Netflix series The Stranded dies in his sleep - AsiaOne
